backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining the BharatSMM backend with services, orders, balances, and user profiles; includes seeded SMM service catalog, order management, and authorization/storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features on the Add Funds page: displaying a copyable UPI ID and replacing the QR code image with a PhonePe QR code.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of short summaries for all frontend source files, describing the purpose of each component, page, hook, and config file in the BharatSMM frontend.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including background, foreground, brand, sidebar, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the BharatSMM React app with dark mode class, favicon, SEO meta tags, and Open Graph/Twitter Card metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app component setting up TanStack Router with all page routes, QueryClient, ThemeProvider, auth gating via Internet Identity, and profile setup modal for new users.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Persistent sidebar layout component with BharatSMM logo, navigation links, conditional admin panel link, sign-out button, and a responsive mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/OrderStatusBadge: Renders a colored pill badge for a given order status value, mapping each status (pending, processing, completed, etc.) to a distinct color scheme.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog component that collects a user's name and email to set up their BharatSMM profile, using the `useSaveCallerUserProfile` mutation and displaying toast notifications on success or failure.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using TanStack Query, reinitializing it when the Internet Identity changes and invalidating dependent queries accordingly.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an `InternetIdentityProvider` context and `useInternetIdentity` hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and persisting identity across page reloads via `AuthClient`.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines TanStack Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profile, services, orders, balance, and top-up operations, each wiring the actor from `useActor` to the appropriate canister calls.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind CSS, imports Google Fonts (Space Grotesk and Inter), and defines a dark navy/charcoal design system with CSS custom properties for colors, brand tokens, and utility component classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with `QueryClientProvider` and `InternetIdentityProvider` wrapping the root `App` component.
frontend/src/pages/AddFunds.tsx: A page component for topping up the user's wallet via UPI, displaying the current balance, a PhonePe QR code, preset amount buttons, and a form that submits a top-up request through the `useInitiateTopUp` mutation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin-only dashboard page with tabs for managing service prices, updating order statuses, and adding balance to user accounts. Renders an access-denied screen for non-admins.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: User dashboard page displaying account stats (balance, total/in-progress/completed orders) and a table of the 5 most recent orders.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Public landing/login page showcasing BharatSMM features and a login button that triggers Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/NewOrder.tsx: Order placement page where users select a social media service category and specific service, enter a link and quantity, and submit an order with balance validation.
frontend/src/pages/Orders.tsx: Paginated orders list page for the authenticated user, with search filtering by service name, link, or order ID and a responsive table showing order details and status.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: React page for viewing and editing the logged-in user's profile (name, email), with principal ID display and copy functionality, backed by TanStack Query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: React page that lists all available social media marketing services with category filter buttons and a search input, grouping results by category with color-coded badges.
frontend/src/utils/orderCalculations.ts: Utility functions for calculating order totals from price-per-1000 and quantity, and formatting numbers as INR currency strings or bigint balances.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence helpers and a function to remove params from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a dark-themed design system with custom colors (brand, navy scale), display/mono font families, border radius tokens, and fade-in animation.
project_state.json: Project state snapshot for the BharatSMM app (version 13), recording implemented features, architectural notes, and requirements including the multi-page frontend, visual theme, admin dashboard, and TanStack Query hooks.
